author: Ashiqur Rahman Khan
content:
There's a 50% chance you’ll probably miss it or look at the dark alley and wonder - this can't be it...because this place is literally at the corner of an alley, blocked by bins from the bar or barrels.

But this is an absolute gem in Manchester! Nothing spectacular, simply basics and that's the beauty of it!

Set of curries with rice, good portions, great atmosphere and very reasonably priced...like £6-£7!

A proper DESI food, when you’re craving for chana daal, keema, or sabzi bhaji.

Great stuff! Since 1984.
And halal.
